description:
In this course, you will learn how to apply a simple and gentle healing technique that quickly triggers a relaxation response and helps people come out of anxiety and stress patterns.

This course is suitable for absolute beginners into the world of natural healing techniques. It is also suitable for the more experienced practitioner (massage, Reiki, acupuncture, energy psychology, EFT, yoga etc.) who are looking to add more powerful techniques to their healing toolbox.

This course will teach you how to treat yourself as well as how to treat others. You will learn a long 12 point version as well as a shorter, 3 point version.

One of the most powerful things you will learn from this course is how to focus in on specific stress patterns and clear them from the system, for good! This technique can potentially clear trauma and emotional stress that has impeded and negatively influenced peoples lives for many years.

This technique can assist with:

  • Any anxiety related symptoms
  • Excessive stress
  • Trauma or any intense emotional experiences from the past
  • Insomnia
  • Phobias
  • Anything that may be limiting you and your life potential


If you were to practice this technique every day for 21-30 days, your life would:

  • Look brighter and more vibrant
  • Be more relaxed and graceful
  • Be more about living in the now
  • Have less anxiety, fear and stress on all levels
  • Experience better quality sleep and relaxation
  • Support and deepen relationships
  • Improve your creativity and work flow


After completing this course you will have a much better understanding as to how stress works, and how you can effectively intervene and clear out stress patterns from your system.

If your looking for a simple, gentle and fast technique to help clear anxiety and stress so you can more easily reach your potential, then this course is for you!
title: Clear Anxiety and Stress Patterns Quickly and Easily
